-e ---

sub = 1/super "under" sous-par

𒉺𒅁 sab

𒉺𒅁𒁲𒇻 sab-di-lu sub-teil "broken off"

𒉺𒅁𒌅 šap-tu < spalt sparte separate > շուրթ šurtʿ 𒉺𒅁𒌅 šap-tu < seprt > ספתא septhā septho شَفَايِف šafāyif 𒉺𒅁𒌅 lip 𓋴 𓊪 𓏏 𓂏

𒌑𒉺𒅁𒄵 u2-sab-birᵏ zerbreche <> separate 𒌑𒉺𒅁𒁲𒇻 u2-sab-di-lu sub-teil "break off"

𒋗𒇧𒀀𒈨 šu-pul'a-me sub… "depth" @ pool

𒆠𒆠 mâtu šaplîtu #utte lower land
